===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[population]]
#: {{zh-x|控制 人口 增長|to control '''population''' growth}}
# [[number]] of [[people]] in a [[family]]
# [[mouth]]s to [[feed]]
# [[people]] {{gloss|in general contexts}}

====Usage notes====
In Chinese, {{lang|zh|人口}} is used to describe a population of people. To describe a population of species, the term {{zh-l|種群}} is used instead.
